search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for LassoCRM (lassocrm.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: I could not find a direct pricing page for Lasso CRM on their official website after searching. You might want to visit their [official website](https://www.lassocrm.com) for more details or contact them directly. Let me know if you need help with this!

extracted_content.content:
No Lead Left Behind
-------------------

###### CRM for Home Builders, Real Estate Developers, and New Home Agencies

Find out how Lasso can help you manage your lead volume effectively today and set you up for success tomorrow.

Want to learn more about Lasso?

2:03

2:03

### What’s Happening

How can Lasso CRM help you?
---------------------------

[![Image 1](https://lassocrm.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/not-selling-as-many-homes.jpg)](https://lassocrm.com/crm-overview/)

###### Give your team the tools for success—get results

As a manager responsible for sales volume and profitability, you need to depend on your team to consistently achieve their monthly targets — no one wants forecasting to be like a day at the casino. With Lasso, you’ll always have insightful information at your command to coach performance and forecast accurately. And your team, no matter the size, will have the right tools to consistently achieve at a high level.

![Image 2](https://lassocrm.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/tracking-leads.jpg)

###### Send more qualified leads to sales

With limited resources and tight budgets of often less than 1% of revenue, it’s critical to maximize every dollar of your marketing spend to drive both the right quality and quantity of leads to the online and onsite teams. Use Lasso to capture, target, and communicate with every lead right from their initial interest through closing, move-in, and beyond.

![Image 3](https://lassocrm.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/marketing-programs-working.jpg)

###### Follow-up faster and set more appointments

Creating, scheduling, and following up on appointments involve spending a lot of time on the phone and doing large amounts of digital follow-up (email, video emails, SMS) — at a high volume every day and with little downtime. Lasso is like an OSC’s dream come true — let it help you do the work booking more qualified appointments.

![Image 4](https://lassocrm.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/leads-falling-through-cracks.jpg)

###### Leave no lead behind—nurture all your leads

Being a new home sales professional is not easy! Hitting sales targets, presale presentations, construction updates, keeping contracts together, final walk-throughs, meetings with other departments, and reports for management are all part of ‘a day in the life’ in sales. Use Lasso to stay super organized and on top of all your activities so you can focus on what really matters – your prospects and purchasers.

Fully equipped – simply designed
--------------------------------

#### Our software is simple to use. Your capabilities are powerful.

[![Image 5](https://lassocrm.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/opt_1_lead_mngmnt2.png)](https://lassocrm.com/lead-management/)

Capture every lead. Respond faster, know more, build deeper relationships, and close more sales.

[![Image 6](https://lassocrm.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/opt_1_email2.png)](https://lassocrm.com/email-marketing/)

Create emails that get read, tracked, and integrated into your customer’s profile like you’ve never seen before.

[![Image 7](https://lassocrm.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/opt_1_lead_mngmnt2.png)](https://lassocrm.com/lead-management/)

Capture every lead. Respond faster, know more, build deeper relationships, and close more sales.

[![Image 8](https://lassocrm.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/opt_1_email2.png)](https://lassocrm.com/email-marketing/)

Create emails that get read, tracked, and integrated into your customer’s profile like you’ve never seen before.

[![Image 9](https://lassocrm.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/opt_1_reporting2.png)](https://lassocrm.com/reporting/)

Data that you can’t analyze is useless. Our powerful reporting options keep you informed.

[![Image 10](https://lassocrm.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/07/opt_1_integration2.png)](https://lassocrm.com/integrations/)

Use our API to save time and streamline processes by connecting to your web forms, construction management/ERP, and other business systems.

For Everyone On Your Team
-------------------------

[![Image 11](https://lassocrm.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/marketers_homepage-crm.jpg)](https://lassocrm.com/marketing-new-homes/)

Send more quality leads to sales, pinpoint the best lead sources, and maximize your marketing ROI.

[![Image 12](https://lassocrm.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/OSC_homepage.jpg)](https://lassocrm.com/online-sales-counselor/)

Everything’s at your fingertips to book more appointments and make follow up a breeze for hundreds or thousands of unique leads each month.

[![Image 13](https://lassocrm.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/sales_homepage.jpg)](https://lassocrm.com/selling-new-homes/)

Be super organized, build deeper relationships, and make more sales with rich profiles, notes, history, and all your activities in one place.

[![Image 14](https://lassocrm.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/managers_homepage.jpg)](https://lassocrm.com/building-new-homes/)

Know what’s going on 24/7 wherever you are so you can coach for success and grow your business faster.

What Our Clients Say
--------------------

Lasso has made the sales process so much simpler. We’ve tried a few other systems and none of them are as user friendly and as easy for the sales team to use.

Vice President, [Brennan Builders](https://www.lassocrm.com/#)

We saw a 15-20% difference in sales, year-over-year, since the company has implemented Lasso CRM.

Micah Dueck

Sales & Marketing Manager, [Homes by Avi](https://www.lassocrm.com/#)

Within three years of implementing Lasso, overall sales for the company grew by 40 percent, and the online department was contributing 15 percent of total sales.

Dianne Gordonn

General Manager, [Rose & Womble](https://www.lassocrm.com/#)

Find Out Why Lasso is the  
#1 CRM for New Home Sales
-----------------------------------------------------
